name: Jupiter Diving
description:
Aliens are setting up bombs at the core of Jupiter in order to deactivate it and destroy the galaxy. It's your job to dive into the gas giant and save the entire system!

Created in a little over 20 hours using Game Maker: Studio 1.4. Models created using MagicaVoxel.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move around. If you click the mouse, you can use that to guide your character around. Just avoid all the aliens and try to get as deep as possible!
